name: Weddings
short_description: Elegant and unforgettable weddings in picturesque settings.
details: Our wedding packages include a dedicated wedding planner, venue decoration, catering services, and more. Create timeless memories on your special day.

name: Birthday Parties
short_description: Fun-filled birthday celebrations for all ages.
details: From kids' themed parties to sophisticated adult celebrations, we provide entertainment, decorations, and customized cakes to make your birthday memorable.

name: Anniversaries
short_description: Romantic anniversary events to cherish special moments.
details: Let us help you plan a romantic anniversary dinner or a lavish party to celebrate your love story. We offer customizable packages to suit your preferences.

name: Engagement Parties
short_description: Celebrate the beginning of a lifelong journey together.
details: Mark the start of your journey towards marriage with a memorable engagement party. We provide venue options, catering, and decor to make it special.

name: Retirement Parties
short_description: Honoring a well-deserved retirement with friends and family.
details: Celebrate the achievements and milestones of a retiree with a retirement party. We offer event planning, entertainment, and heartfelt tributes.

name: Baby Shower
short_description: Joyful gatherings to welcome a new addition to the family.
details: Host a baby shower filled with joy and excitement. We provide themed decorations, games, and a cozy atmosphere for this special occasion.
